text: First edition (publ. McClelland & Stewart) No New Land is a novel by M. G. Vassanji, published in 1991. The action is largely set in Dar es Salaam and Toronto. The title is derivited from Lawrence Durrell's novel The Alexandria Quartet, in which he translates Constantine P. Cavafy's "The City". Category:1991 Canadian novels Category:Novels by M. G. Vassanji Category:Novels set in Toronto Category:Novels set in Tanzania Category:McClelland & Stewart books Category:Culture in Dar es Salaam
title: No New Land
